main.name: Anthony Christopher
main.description: Determined and hardworking, I find pleasure in the proccess and being the best I can be.
main.bio: I am a December 2022 graduate from Whitworth University with a degree in computer science and business. As a college student athlete (football) I was and still am extremely motivated, competitive, and intentional. Iâ€™m currently looking for full time positions or other opportunities. I take pride in hard work and the process; I really hope to bring just as much if not more to an organization as it brings to me.

education.degree: Degree in Computer Science and Business

work.title: Fullstack Developer/Project Management Intern
work.description: Communicated with a team of 20+, shipped websites/web ads from the bottom up, worked in React, GSAP, JavaScript, and front-end frameworks. Created 3 web banner ads with animations, created websites for big companies such as Nike, Gatorade, and Rock-star. Attended daily morning meetings, staged websites and web banners.

work.title: Software Engineering Intern
work.description: Tested the web application, found bugs and ways to improve the application, communicated with a team of 3 developers. Worked in JavaScript, React, and basic front-end languages. Shipped a V2 of a web application, communicated with clients for specifications, carried out quality assurance testing, created pop ups for the web application.

work.title: Application/Web Developer

work.title: General Sales
